original_data.Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
original_data.Short Intro: Accelerate your career with this Master's in Artificial Intelligence in conjunction with IBM. This program includes industry-relevant courses, such as Data Science with Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and Chat GPT and also features hackathons and AMA sessions hosted by IBM. Get job-ready in the AI domain with Capstone projects, practical labs, live sessions, and hands-on projects.
original_data.Course Type: Ranked #1 Masters in Artificial Intelligence Program by Career Karma
